column4: [THC]AcidRain> try service postfgix status and let us know the output
[THC]AcidRain> ok can you telnet to port 25 on localhost?
[THC]AcidRain> hmm try cd /var and then touch test
it wont let me send a mail. it will just say its queued
like im totally lost man. i dont know what went wrong or where
[THC]AcidRain> is the /var partition full, have you restarted potfix and are you getting spammed or hosting someone whos spamming?
and the irc just said that my hostnames dont match. so now im thinking i really messed up soemwhere :/
as long as you have all the dependencies ./configure && make && make instal ...
pretty much a complete walkthrough on where im messing up with postfix
